body.name: ASICS Men's Gel-Dedicate 8 Pickleball Shoes
features: Origin Made in the USA or Imported
Solution dye sockliner helps reduce overall water usage by approx. 33% and carbon emissions by approx. 45%:
TRUSSTIC technology and wrap-up outsole: Improve stability
GEL technology cushioning: Provides excellent shock absorption
body.description: The GEL-DEDICATE 8 PICKLEBALL shoe offers good stability and a flexible feel to keep your mind centered during the match.​ This shoe’s upper is constructed with synthetic leather overlays to improve support. They keep your feet locked-in when you’re switching directions and chasing down challenging shots.​ A TRUSSTIC support unit and wrap-up outsole improve stability while allowing your feet to move freely. This lets you change directions more confidently, particularly if you’re moving side-to-side.​

productInformation.value: #45,542 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry) #32 in Men's Tennis & Racquet Sport Shoes #205 in Tennis Footwear

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These shoes are actually really good I honestly didn’t expect anything bad since it’s ASICS. The grip is very good you won’t slip when running around the court. I had a game the day after the shoes came in and honestly I felt better on the court. The shoes I had previously were very uncomfortable I had formed 3 blisters and so I got these shoes quiet urgently. These shoes were so soft before the blister on my toe was very hard to play with I had lost games very bad but when I got these shoes it was like I was flying. I don’t mean to be sarcastic but these shoes are honestly so good I was running around fast and stayed on the ground without slipping. My serves also were better idk if it had to do with the shoes or if I was just good with aim that day but my serves were on fire. The quality is top notch it very breathable, soft, and comfortable. It gives you all the flexibility you need to move how u want but tight enough to not having you slipping around. I’d say it was very worth my money the design is cute and it’s very good. I got many compliments on the shoes honestly even if u don’t need them for tennis they would be good everyday shoes cause their so adorable. The color ateeee. I liked the neutral grey and white it just goes so well together. Sometime people manage to make grey ugly but ASICS didn’t cus they ate up this color match. I love the grey contrast with the white. The fit was very good. It is true to size. Although I do want to say one thing, my normal shoes size for example Nike I am a 5 but even with that my shoes slip off a bit, for the ASICS I got a size 6 so I do recommend that you size up 1 or 2 times your usual. SUPER LIGHT WEIGHT. This is what I love about it. I put em on and it’s like I’m bare foot cause they are so light. That’s one of my favorite things. I like my rackets light and I like my shoes light it just helps me out so much. I personally thinks it holds you down better without slowing you down either for those low shots. The only thing I can really complain about is sometimes the shoes causes discomfort down the middle of my upper foot. Maybe I got a size to small but usually I adjust it a little but and it’s soft again usually it goes back to the stabbing pain. But it’s kind of weird because it only happens sometimes when I wear them. Like my last game I had while on the bus I had to untie and let it go for a bit but today during practice nothing was wrong so idk maybe I’m weird. Another thing is that sometime my knots don’t stay and so I have to re tie then every once and a while usually u do it tighter but if I do try that it gets too tight. N e ways that’s all 9.7/10 would recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great tennis shoe - for clay tennis courts.
reviews.reviewText: Very comfortable. Ordered 7.5 wide and a perfect fit, so “true to size” with only a couple hours of wear to feel great on feet. Nice color! Love it, so far!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Runs a little on the small side but otherwise a cute and comfy shoe. Great grip on the court.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great shoes great comfort
reviews.reviewText: The product fits true to size. Extremely comfortable and they look great! This is my first pair of shoes I’ve bought specifically for pickleball. 6 months later after probably 6 hours a week.. they’re still holding up great. Definitely recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Shoe Insert substandard; No arch or side support, appears cheaper versions. Slightly small
reviews.reviewText: The inside of the shoe is not constructed to the standards of ASICS. It appears the cushion (foot) pad is just hand cut with scissors and not formed for the particular shoe. It is a tough piece of thin, thin shoe insert with no arch and side supports; otherwise, similar to the quality of ASICS Women's tennis/pickelball shoes. Disappointed. And a 1/4 to 1/2 size smaller in length and felt a 1/8 to 1/4 inch smaller in width. It could be difference between shoes broken in and those that are not. The new shoes are going back for a quality ASICS shoe, or a different shoes. It just look like ASICS ran out of the inserts and improvished and hand cut from inexpensive material and stuck them into these shoes. Too bad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for narrow foot
reviews.reviewText: I tried these on in a store but my size was not available...I am normally a 9.5 in sneakers and either a 9 or 9.5 in regular shoes. I tried the 9 which was too short and the 10 which was big. The price in the store was $80 and here on Amazon $64. I knew they would be comfortable. I have a narrow foot so these were perfect in the toe and all over. I have a long big toe on both feet and the extra half size is more comfortable. I like the padded heel. I also have a bunion on one foot and there is plenty of room for me and the bunion. I like the way the front narrows down a bit and doesn't look too clunky on my big feet. I love the style...so pretty. These may not be as comfortable for someone with a wider foot. I also don't wear socks with any sneakers and was bouncing around the house and outside with these and absolutely love them. I got the pink and white...really really feminine.I retired a pair of old Asics a couple of years ago that I wore for so many years that most of the sole had worn down to almost no treads..those were my walking sneakers. I would come back to this brand again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Bottoms wear out quicky
reviews.reviewText: I liked them a lot when I first got them. Loved style, fit, comfort. After only 2 and half months, bottoms worn out, completely flat in some sections. I only wear them for about 2 hours twice a week.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Me encantaron. Y el color esta muy lindo. Perfectos y llegaron muy rápido!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente producto en precio calidad comodidad
reviews.reviewText: Son especiales para vóleibolLos usa mi hija y quedo maravillada en el color y lo cómodos que son 🙌🏼
La talla es correcta , el color es igual que la publicacion y el tiempo de entrega fue antes de lo indicado
Son cómodos, pero si se sienten rígidos. Si buscas suavidad en un par de tenis no lo encontrarás en este modelo, la horma es para pie delgado.
Son muy adecuados para el volibol.Muy cómodos, llegaron antes dela fecha
